crypto.name: Curve Ball
crypto.desc:
Alan Davide Bovo <@AlBovo>

Our casino's new cryptographic gambling system uses elliptic curves for provably fair betting.

We're so confident in our implementation that we even give you an oracle to verify points!

crypto.name: Ice Cramer
crypto.desc:
Alan Davide Bovo <@AlBovo>

Elia’s swamped with algebra but craving a new ice-cream flavor, help him crack these equations so he can trade books for a cone!

crypto.name: Linux Penguin
crypto.desc:
Alan Davide Bovo <@AlBovo>

I've just installed Arch Linux and I couldn't be any happier :)

crypto.name: XorD
crypto.desc:
Filippo Boschi <@pllossi>

I just discovered bitwise operators, so I guess 1 XOR 1 = 1?

crypto.name: wordy
crypto.desc:
Alessandro Bombarda <@ale18V>

Bored in class? Try this cryptic Wordle twist and crack the next word! 🧩🔐

misc.name: Geoguesser
misc.desc:
Alan Davide Bovo <@AlBovo>, Fabio Fantini <@FabioFant>

Alan Spendaccione accumulated so much debts that he travelled far away to escape Fabio Mafioso, join the mafia and help Fabio catch Alan!

The flag format is pascalCTF{YY.YY,XX.XX} where Y=latitude and X=longitude, round the numbers down.

misc.name: Keep Scripting
misc.desc:
Marco Balducci <@Mark-74>

I always loved bombare, but my friend Elia challenged me to finish this level in 1 minute! It's impossible!!!1!

misc.name: Stinky Slim
misc.desc:
Enea Maroncelli <@ZazaMan>

I don't trust Patapim; I think he is hiding something from me.

misc.name: SurgoCompany
misc.desc:
Fabio Fantini <@fobiathegamer>

SurgoCompany™ has just launched a brand-new online Customer Service platform 🧩. The system is still under development, and you've been asked to test it 😈. Simply enter your email, describe your issue, and optionally upload a file related to your problem 🤨.

The source code of the challenge is saved somewhere on the filesystem... and rumor has it that a file named flag.txt is hiding in that very same folder 😜.

Can you find a way to read it?

misc.name: Very Simple Framer
misc.desc:
Marco Balducci <@Mark-74>

I decided to make a simple framer application, obviously with the help of my dear friend, you really think I would write that stuff?

pwn.name: AHC Average Heap Challenge
pwn.desc:
Marco Balducci <@Mark-74>

I believe I'm not that good at math at this point...

pwn.name: Grande Inutile Tool
pwn.desc:
Alan Davide Bovo <@AlBovo>

Many friends of mine hate git, so I made a git-like tool for them.

The flag can be found at /flag.

pwn.name: Malta Nightlife
pwn.desc:
Enea Maroncelli <@ZazaMan>, Alan Davide Bovo <@AlBovo>

You’ve never seen drinks this cheap in Malta, come join the fun! 🍹

pwn.name: Packet Tracer 2
pwn.desc:
Marco Balducci <@Mark-74>

No way! They released a new version of my favorite software, Cisco Packet Tracer, now completely accessible by CLI!

pwn.name: YetAnotherNoteTaker
pwn.desc:
Alan Davide Bovo <@AlBovo>

I've read too many notes recently, I can't take it anymore...

rev.name: Albo delle Eccellenze
rev.desc:
Alan Davide Bovo <@AlBovo>

One of our former Blaisone CTF Team members 🚩 has just earned a medal in the Cyberchallenge.IT contest 🥳.

He’s now wondering whether he also received a prize 🏆, could you help him find out?

rev.name: AuraTester2000
rev.desc:
Enea Maroncelli <@Zazaman>

Will you be able to gain enogh aura?

rev.name: StrangeVM
rev.desc:
Alan Davide Bovo <@AlBovo>

A 🧙🏻‍♂️ stranger once built a VM and hid the Forbidden Key🥀, can you uncover it?

P.S.: Keep all the files in the same directory for easier debugging and execution.

rev.name: curly crab
rev.desc:
Renato Eugenio Maria Marziano <@marspiter>

A crab stole my json schema...

web.name: PDFile
web.desc:
Alan Davide Bovo <@AlBovo>

I've recently developed a XML to PDF utility, I'll probably add payments to it soon!

web.name: ZazaStore
web.desc:
Enea Maroncelli <@ZazaMan>, Alan Davide Bovo <@AlBovo>

We dont take any responsibility in any damage that our product may cause to the user's health
